page.title: 18SCHOOL LESSONS IN HESSLE
page.content: This is the account of a 9 year-old pupil describing her school timetable: "At school we learn Maths, Science, Language and Reading and many other things. We all like Games, it is a lot of fun. My favourite subject at school is Topic Work. I like it because of all the pictures you can draw. Also I like making up my own stories. Last term in our Topic lessons, we studied the Normans, this term we are studying Islands. I like writing and I like Maths. We have some forecast sheets at the back of our book so our teacher does not have to tell us what our next page of Maths is."
